publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2379 Claire Baker: Congratulations to Third Force News—That the Parliament congratulates Third Force News (TFN), Scotland’s weekly voluntary sector newspaper, on reaching its 500th edition and its 10th anniversary; believes that TFN plays a crucial role in keeping the voluntary sector informed and in keeping members of the Parliament and others informed of news and current issues in the sector; further believes that the voluntary sector is crucial to the full breadth of Scottish life; wishes the TFN staff all the best, and looks forward to its 1,000th edition in another 10 years.

S3M-2379 Congratulations to Third Force News (lodged on 8 August 2008) Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Nanette Milne*, Liam McArthur*, Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Iain Gray*, Angela Constance*, Alasdair Allan*, John Park*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, George Foulkes*, Mary Mulligan*, Ken Macintosh*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Tolson*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-2379 Congratulations to Third Force News (lodged on 8 August 2008) Cathy Peattie*, Robin Harper*
